name: Chabudai Flip
description:
A submission for Low Effort Jam 13.

Chabudai is a small table in Japan. In old Japanese dramas and cartoons, characters sometimes express their anger by flipping a chabudai with food and drinks on top, making a mess. This game, on the other hand, is about a chabudai flipping itself.

Controls:
[C key] or [Right Arrow] to retract the right legs.
[Z key] or [Left Arrow] to retract the left legs.
[SPACE bar] while upside down on the ground to perform Chabudai Flip.
